doc.after: In 1710 Handel became Kapellmeister to German prince George the Elector of Hanover who in 1714 would become King George I of Great Britain and Ireland 21 He visited Anna Maria Luisa de Medici and her husband in D sseldorf on his way to London in 1710 With his opera Rinaldo based on La Gerusalemme Liberata by the Italian poet Torquato Tasso Handel enjoyed great success although it was composed quickly with many borrowings from his older Italian works 22 This work contains one of Handel s favourite arias Cara sposa amante cara and the famous Lascia ch io pianga
